meaningMnemonic: The <radical>warehouse</radical> radical and the <kanji>warehouse</kanji> kanji are the same! You can call it a <kanji>storehouse</kanji> too.
readingMnemonic: You have a <kanji>warehouse</kanji> to store all of your <reading>sou</reading>ls (そう). When people or animals you know pass away, you take their souls and store them in your dry warehouse for safekeeping. It's a public service, really.
